017package org.apache.juneau.bean.atom;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.Utils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
021
022import java.util.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
026
027/**
028 * Base class for feed-level and entry-level Atom elements.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * This abstract class contains properties common to {@link Feed}, {@link Entry}, and {@link Source}
032 * elements. These elements share a common set of metadata properties including authors, contributors,
033 * categories, links, and timestamps.
034 *
035 * <p>
036 * Common properties include:
037 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
038 *    <li><b>id</b> (required) - Permanent, unique identifier
039 *    <li><b>title</b> (required) - Human-readable title
040 *    <li><b>updated</b> (required) - Last modification timestamp
041 *    <li><b>authors</b> - Author information
042 *    <li><b>categories</b> - Classification/tagging information
043 *    <li><b>contributors</b> - Contributor information
044 *    <li><b>links</b> - Related resources
045 *    <li><b>rights</b> - Copyright/rights information
046 * </ul>
047 *
048 * <p>
049 * This class extends {@link Common}, inheriting the <c>xml:base</c> and <c>xml:lang</c> attributes.
050 *
051 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
052 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanAtom">juneau-bean-atom</a>
053 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287">RFC 4287 - The Atom Syndication Format</a>
054 * </ul>
055 */
056public class CommonEntry extends Common {
057
058   private Person[] authors;
059   private Category[] categories;
060   private Person[] contributors;
061   private Id id;
062   private Link[] links;
063   private Text rights;
064   private Text title;
065   private Calendar updated;
066
067   /**
068    * Normal constructor.
069    *
070    * @param id The ID of this object.
071    * @param title The title of this object.
072    * @param updated The updated timestamp of this object.
073    */
074   public CommonEntry(Id id, Text title, Calendar updated) {
075      setId(id).setTitle(title).setUpdated(updated);
076   }
077
078   /**
079    * Normal constructor.
080    *
081    * @param id The ID of this object.
082    * @param title The title of this object.
083    * @param updated The updated timestamp of this object.
084    */
085   public CommonEntry(String id, String title, String updated) {
086      setId(id).setTitle(title).setUpdated(updated);
087   }
088
089   /** Bean constructor. */
090   public CommonEntry() {}
091
092   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
093   // Bean properties
094   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
095
096   /**
097    * Bean property getter:  <property>authors</property>.
098    *
099    * <p>
100    * The list of authors for this object.
101    *
102    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
103    */
104   @Xml(format=COLLAPSED, childName="author")
105   public Person[] getAuthors() {
106      return authors;
107   }
108
109   /**
110    * Bean property setter:  <property>authors</property>.
111    *
112    * <p>
113    * The list of authors for this object.
114    *
115    * @param value
116    *    The new value for this property.
117    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
118    * @return This object
119    */
120   public CommonEntry setAuthors(Person...value) {
121      this.authors = value;
122      return this;
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Bean property getter:  <property>categories</property>.
127    *
128    * <p>
129    * The list of categories of this object.
130    *
131    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
132    */
133   @Xml(format=COLLAPSED, childName="category")
134   public Category[] getCategories() {
135      return categories;
136   }
137
138   /**
139    * Bean property setter:  <property>categories</property>.
140    *
141    * <p>
142    * The list of categories of this object.
143    *
144    * @param value
145    *    The new value for this property.
146    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
147    * @return This object
148    */
149   public CommonEntry setCategories(Category...value) {
150      this.categories = value;
151      return this;
152   }
153
154   /**
155    * Bean property getter:  <property>contributors</property>.
156    *
157    * <p>
158    * The list of contributors of this object.
159    *
160    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
161    */
162   @Xml(format=COLLAPSED, childName="contributor")
163   public Person[] getContributors() {
164      return contributors;
165   }
166
167   /**
168    * Bean property setter:  <property>contributors</property>.
169    *
170    * <p>
171    * The list of contributors of this object.
172    *
173    * @param value
174    *    The new value for this property.
175    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
176    * @return This object
177    */
178   public CommonEntry setContributors(Person...value) {
179      this.contributors = value;
180      return this;
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Bean property getter:  <property>id</property>.
185    *
186    * <p>
187    * The ID of this object.
188    *
189    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
190    */
191   public Id getId() {
192      return id;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * Bean property setter:  <property>id</property>.
197    *
198    * <p>
199    * The ID of this object.
200    *
201    * @param value
202    *    The new value for this property.
203    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
204    * @return This object
205    */
206   public CommonEntry setId(Id value) {
207      this.id = value;
208      return this;
209   }
210
211   /**
212    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>id</property>.
213    *
214    * <p>
215    * The ID of this object.
216    *
217    * @param value
218    *    The new value for this property.
219    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
220    * @return This object.
221    */
222   public CommonEntry setId(String value) {
223      setId(new Id(value));
224      return this;
225   }
226
227   /**
228    * Bean property getter:  <property>links</property>.
229    *
230    * <p>
231    * The list of links of this object.
232    *
233    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
234    */
235   @Xml(format=COLLAPSED)
236   public Link[] getLinks() {
237      return links;
238   }
239
240   /**
241    * Bean property setter:  <property>links</property>.
242    *
243    * <p>
244    * The list of links of this object.
245    *
246    * @param value
247    *    The new value for this property.
248    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
249    * @return This object
250    */
251   public CommonEntry setLinks(Link...value) {
252      this.links = value;
253      return this;
254   }
255
256   /**
257    * Bean property getter:  <property>rights</property>.
258    *
259    * <p>
260    * The rights statement of this object.
261    *
262    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
263    */
264   public Text getRights() {
265      return rights;
266   }
267
268   /**
269    * Bean property setter:  <property>rights</property>.
270    *
271    * <p>
272    * The rights statement of this object.
273    *
274    * @param value
275    *    The new value for this property.
276    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
277    * @return This object
278    */
279   public CommonEntry setRights(Text value) {
280      this.rights = value;
281      return this;
282   }
283
284   /**
285    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>rights</property>.
286    *
287    * <p>
288    * The rights statement of this object.
289    *
290    * @param value
291    *    The new value for this property.
292    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
293    * @return This object.
294    */
295   public CommonEntry setRights(String value) {
296      setRights(new Text().setText(value));
297      return this;
298   }
299
300   /**
301    * Bean property getter:  <property>title</property>.
302    *
303    * <p>
304    * The title of this object.
305    *
306    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
307    */
308   public Text getTitle() {
309      return title;
310   }
311
312   /**
313    * Bean property setter:  <property>title</property>.
314    *
315    * <p>
316    * The title of this object.
317    *
318    * @param value
319    *    The new value for this property.
320    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
321    * @return This object
322    */
323   public CommonEntry setTitle(Text value) {
324      this.title = value;
325      return this;
326   }
327
328   /**
329    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>title</property>.
330    *
331    * <p>
332    * The title of this object.
333    *
334    * @param value
335    *    The new value for this property.
336    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
337    * @return This object.
338    */
339   public CommonEntry setTitle(String value) {
340      setTitle(new Text().setText(value));
341      return this;
342   }
343
344   /**
345    * Bean property getter:  <property>updated</property>.
346    *
347    * <p>
348    * The update timestamp of this object.
349    *
350    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
351    */
352   public Calendar getUpdated() {
353      return updated;
354   }
355
356   /**
357    * Bean property setter:  <property>updated</property>.
358    *
359    * <p>
360    * The update timestamp of this object.
361    *
362    * @param value
363    *    The new value for this property.
364    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
365    * @return This object
366    */
367   public CommonEntry setUpdated(Calendar value) {
368      this.updated = value;
369      return this;
370   }
371
372   /**
373    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>updated</property>.
374    *
375    * <p>
376    * The update timestamp of this object.
377    *
378    * @param value
379    *    The new value for this property.
380    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
381    * @return This object.
382    */
383   public CommonEntry setUpdated(String value) {
384      setUpdated(parseDateTime(value));
385      return this;
386   }
387
388   @Override /* Overridden from Common */
389   public CommonEntry setBase(Object value) {
390      super.setBase(value);
391      return this;
392   }
393
394   @Override /* Overridden from Common */
395   public CommonEntry setLang(String value) {
396      super.setLang(value);
397      return this;
398   }
399}
